data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Gorj, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gorj, Romania

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Gorj, Romania by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Gorj prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Gorj. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Tajik people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Gorj, Romania.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Gorj, Romania will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Father, convict the 19,748 believers in Gorj to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
